statements: DELETE FROM trending_topics WHERE id = 1 AND activity_count > 100;
DELETE FROM trending_topics WHERE hashtag = 'Tech' AND topic LIKE '%AI%';
DELETE FROM trending_topics WHERE popularity < 100 AND topic = 'Technology';
DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 101 AND activity_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM topic_hashtags WHERE topic_id = 1 AND hashtag_id = 3;
DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 10 AND activity_type = 'login';
